journeys.title: Navigating Grief and Loss
journeys.summary: Missions to survive the heavy days, handle triggers, and process grief with gentleness and faith.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are surviving and healing one day at a time.

missions.title: Do a Grief Check-In
missions.subtitle: Name what you feel right now.
missions.whyThisMatters: Naming your grief helps you carry it with less fear.

cards.title: Your mission
cards.text: Today, name your grief in one word.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: Your feelings are valid. You’re not failing.

completionCard.title: You checked in
completionCard.message: Naming it helped you carry it today.

missions.title: Create a Memory Box
missions.subtitle: Put special items in one safe place.
missions.whyThisMatters: Memories matter, but scattered reminders can hurt daily.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: You’re honoring love while protecting your day.

completionCard.title: You honored and protected
completionCard.message: You gave memories a safe place.

missions.title: Make Your Trigger Plan
missions.subtitle: Plan what you’ll do when a grief wave hits.
missions.whyThisMatters: Grief triggers are normal. A plan reduces overwhelm.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose 1 action (call someone, walk, pray, breathe).
Save it in your phone notes.

completionCard.title: You prepared
completionCard.message: A plan helps you feel safer.

missions.title: Do a Breath Prayer
missions.subtitle: Use short prayer when overwhelmed.
missions.whyThisMatters: Short prayers help when words are hard.

missions.title: Meet One Basic Need
missions.subtitle: Eat, bathe, or rest—one thing.
missions.whyThisMatters: Grief drains your body. Small care keeps you stable.

missions.title: Talk to a Safe Person
missions.subtitle: Share one hard moment with someone safe.
missions.whyThisMatters: Grief gets heavier when you are alone.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Call or voice note one safe person.

missions.title: Walk in the Sun for 10 Minutes
missions.subtitle: Move your body gently.
missions.whyThisMatters: Gentle movement helps your body process grief stress.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Notice one thing that is still beautiful.

completionCard.title: You helped your body
completionCard.message: Your body got a little relief.

missions.title: Set a Grief Boundary
missions.subtitle: Protect your heart from draining conversations.
missions.whyThisMatters: Some people say hurtful things. Boundaries protect you.

missions.title: Pray for Strength
missions.subtitle: Ask God to strengthen you for today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Daily grace is enough for daily grief.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Grief Habit
missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small routines stabilize grief.

cards.title: Choose your habit
options: I do a breath prayer daily
I talk to a safe person twice this week

journeys.title: Supporting Kid(s) Through Grief
journeys.summary: Missions to help your kid(s) feel safe, talk about feelings, and grieve with support and stability.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are giving your kid(s) safety through grief.

missions.title: Do a Feelings Check-In
missions.subtitle: Ask your kid(s) one simple question.
missions.whyThisMatters: Kid(s) grieve differently. Simple check-ins build safety.

cards.title: Your mission
cards.text: Ask your kid(s): “How are you feeling today?”

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: If they don’t talk, stay calm. Keep showing up.

completionCard.title: You checked in
completionCard.message: That question gave your kid(s) safety.

missions.title: Do a Memory Talk
missions.subtitle: Share one good memory gently.
missions.whyThisMatters: Memories help kid(s) hold love without fear.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Share one good memory of your spouse.

missions.title: Create a Routine Anchor
missions.subtitle: Add one predictable daily routine.
missions.whyThisMatters: Routine gives kid(s) safety when life feels unstable.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pick one anchor: bedtime prayer, dinner time, morning hug.

missions.title: Give Safe Words
missions.subtitle: Tell your kid(s) what is true and safe.
missions.whyThisMatters: Kid(s) need reassurance they won’t be abandoned.

missions.title: Pick a Grief Signal
missions.subtitle: Create a simple signal for hard moments.
missions.whyThisMatters: Signals help kid(s) express feelings without fear.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Pick a signal: raised hand, a word like “heavy,” or a hug request.
Agree: signal means you pause and listen.

missions.title: Limit Overexposure
missions.subtitle: Reduce one thing that overwhelms them.
missions.whyThisMatters: Too much adult stress can overwhelm kid(s).

cards.title: Pick one
options: Adult arguments in front of them

missions.title: Do 15 Minutes of Play
missions.subtitle: Play with your kid(s) without your phone.
missions.whyThisMatters: Play helps kid(s) process grief safely.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Play a game, draw, or walk together.

missions.title: Pray With Your Kid(s)
missions.subtitle: Say a short prayer together.
missions.whyThisMatters: Faith gives kid(s) comfort and hope.

missions.title: Do a School Check
missions.subtitle: Check if grief is affecting school.
missions.whyThisMatters: Kid(s) often show grief through behavior and school performance.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Ask teacher: “How is my kid(s) doing lately?”

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Kid(s) Habit
missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small daily care builds security.

cards.title: Choose your habit
options: I do a feelings check-in daily
I keep a routine anchor daily
I do 15 minutes of play daily

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You supported your kid(s) with stability and love.

journeys.title: Rebuilding Life After Loss
journeys.summary: Missions to rebuild routines, manage loneliness, and find purpose again without rushing your healing.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are becoming stronger and steadier.

missions.title: Create One Small Routine
missions.subtitle: Do one simple daily routine today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Routines rebuild stability when life feels broken.

cards.title: Your mission
cards.text: Choose one small routine and do it today.

completionCard.title: You rebuilt stability
completionCard.message: That routine helped your day feel safer.

missions.title: Handle a Lonely Evening
missions.subtitle: Plan one safe evening activity.
missions.whyThisMatters: Evenings can be heavy. Planning reduces loneliness.

missions.title: Do a Finance Check
missions.subtitle: Look at your money situation calmly.
missions.whyThisMatters: Financial stress increases grief stress. Small clarity helps.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Check your balance and bills list.

missions.title: Take One Health Step
missions.subtitle: Do one health action today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Grief affects health. Small steps protect your body.

missions.title: Schedule One Support Moment
missions.subtitle: Plan one support moment in your week.
missions.whyThisMatters: Support keeps you from drowning in loneliness.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Schedule a call, visit, or church meeting.

missions.title: Take One Purpose Step
missions.subtitle: Do one small purpose action.
missions.whyThisMatters: Purpose returns in small steps.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose one thing you care about.

missions.title: Do One Household Task
missions.subtitle: Handle one practical task today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Practical progress rebuilds confidence.

missions.title: Set a Boundary Around a Trigger
missions.subtitle: Reduce exposure to one trigger today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Boundaries reduce overwhelm.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Choose one trigger and reduce exposure today.
Replace it with a calming activity.

missions.title: Pray for Your Future
missions.subtitle: Ask God to guide your next season.
missions.whyThisMatters: Faith gives hope for the next chapter.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Rebuild Habit
missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Consistency rebuilds life.

cards.title: Choose your habit
options: I keep one small routine daily
I take one health step daily
I do one practical task daily

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You rebuilt stability and purpose step by step.

journeys.title: Honoring the Past While Moving Forward
journeys.summary: Missions to honor your spouse’s memory while giving yourself permission to keep living.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are honoring love and choosing life at the same time.

missions.title: Write Your Honor Statement
missions.subtitle: Write one sentence that honors your spouse and your future.
missions.whyThisMatters: Honor helps you move forward without guilt.

cards.title: Your mission
cards.text: Write one sentence that honors your spouse and your future.

cards.title: Examples
bullets: “I honor our love, and I am allowed to keep living.”
“I will remember, and I will also move forward.”

missions.title: Create a Memory Ritual
missions.subtitle: Choose one small ritual to honor them.
missions.whyThisMatters: Rituals help grief feel respectful, not chaotic.

completionCard.title: You created honor
completionCard.message: A ritual gave memory a safe place.

missions.title: Remove One Guilt Phrase
missions.subtitle: Stop saying one guilt sentence today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Guilt can become a prison. Words matter.

cards.title: Stop this phrase
bullets: “If I laugh, it means I don’t care.”
“If I move on, I am betraying them.”

missions.title: Share One Story
missions.subtitle: Tell someone one good story about your spouse.
missions.whyThisMatters: Sharing keeps love honored and reduces isolation.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Tell one trusted person one good story.
Smile if it comes. Don’t fight it.

completionCard.title: You honored love
completionCard.message: That story kept love alive in a healthy way.

missions.title: Choose One Future Activity
missions.subtitle: Do one small life-giving activity today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Future steps reduce hopelessness.

cards.title: Pick one
options: Go out for a short walk

completionCard.title: You chose life
completionCard.message: That step was healthy and brave.

missions.title: Set a Boundary With People
missions.subtitle: Protect yourself from hurtful comments.
missions.whyThisMatters: Some people pressure widows. Boundaries protect you.

cards.title: Say this
bullets: “I will decide in my own time.”

missions.title: Do One Legacy Action
missions.subtitle: Do one thing your spouse would be proud of.
missions.whyThisMatters: Legacy actions turn grief into meaning.

missions.title: Allow Both Gratitude and Tears
missions.subtitle: Give yourself 5 minutes to feel both.
missions.whyThisMatters: Mixed emotions are normal in grief.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Think of one gratitude and one sorrow.

completionCard.title: You allowed real grief
completionCard.message: You didn’t force yourself to be okay.

missions.title: Pray to Release Guilt
missions.subtitle: Ask God to free you from guilt.
missions.whyThisMatters: God does not want you trapped in guilt.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Honor Habit
missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Habits create steady healing.

cards.title: Choose your habit
options: I speak my honor statement daily
I do one life-giving activity daily

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You honored the past and moved forward with grace.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are becoming stronger and steadier.

missions.whyThisMatters: Loss can shake identity. Naming helps rebuild it.

cards.title: Your mission
cards.text: Write 3 identity statements about you today.

missions.title: Use One Strength
missions.subtitle: Do one action that uses your strength.
missions.whyThisMatters: Purpose grows when you use your strengths.

missions.title: Take One Small Goal Step
missions.subtitle: Do 10 minutes on a goal you value.
missions.whyThisMatters: Goals rebuild forward movement.

missions.title: Reconnect With One Person
missions.subtitle: Reach out to one safe person.
missions.whyThisMatters: Connection protects identity from isolation.

cards.title: Send this

missions.title: Try One New Activity
missions.subtitle: Try something new for 20 minutes.
missions.whyThisMatters: New experiences rebuild a life story.

missions.title: Update Your Space
missions.subtitle: Change one small thing in your home.
missions.whyThisMatters: Small changes create a new chapter feeling.

completionCard.title: You refreshed your space
completionCard.message: Your space supported your new chapter.

missions.title: Serve Someone
missions.subtitle: Do one act of service today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Service gives purpose and connection.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Help someone with a small task.

missions.title: Pray About Your Identity
missions.subtitle: Ask God to guide your next chapter.
missions.whyThisMatters: Faith anchors identity when life changes.

cards.title: Pray this
bullets: “Help me know who I am now.”

missions.title: Choose One Role to Build
missions.subtitle: Pick one role you want to grow in.
missions.whyThisMatters: Roles help you build a new life story.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Purpose Habit
missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Habits rebuild identity over time.

cards.title: Choose your habit
options: I do one goal step daily

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You rebuilt identity and purpose with steady steps.

journeys.title: Emotional Readiness for Love Again
journeys.summary: Missions to know when you are ready, reduce guilt, and approach love again with calm wisdom.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are preparing your heart with wisdom and gentleness.

missions.title: Do Your Readiness Questions
missions.subtitle: Answer 6 yes/no questions honestly.
missions.whyThisMatters: Readiness protects you from rushing or staying stuck.

cards.title: Questions
bullets: Can I enjoy a moment without guilt?
Can I talk about my spouse without breaking down every time?
Do I want companionship for healthy reasons?
Do I trust God with my next chapter?

missions.title: Define What You Want
missions.subtitle: Write what you want from love again.
missions.whyThisMatters: Clarity prevents confusion and pressure.

missions.title: Set Your Guilt Boundary
missions.subtitle: Choose one thought you will stop today.
missions.whyThisMatters: Guilt can block healthy love.

cards.title: Stop this thought
bullets: “I’m betraying my spouse if I move forward.”

missions.title: Take One Social Step
missions.subtitle: Have one light conversation with someone new or safe.
missions.whyThisMatters: Social steps rebuild confidence gently.

missions.title: Write Your Dating Boundaries
missions.subtitle: Write 5 boundaries you will keep.
missions.whyThisMatters: Boundaries protect your peace and your family.

missions.title: Talk to a Mentor
missions.subtitle: Share your readiness questions with someone wise.
missions.whyThisMatters: Wise counsel reduces mistakes.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Share your biggest fear about love again.

missions.title: Have a Family Conversation
missions.subtitle: If you have kid(s), do one gentle check-in.
missions.whyThisMatters: Family safety matters when dating again.

cards.title: Tip
cards.text: If no kid(s), do this with a trusted family member instead.

missions.title: Practice Your Story
missions.subtitle: Practice a calm one-minute version of your story.
missions.whyThisMatters: A steady story prevents oversharing and bitterness.

cards.title: Say this
bullets: “I loved my spouse deeply. I lost them.”
“I’m healing, and I’m open to a healthy future in time.”

completionCard.title: You practiced steadiness
completionCard.message: Your story sounded calm and healthy.

missions.title: Pray for Your Heart
missions.subtitle: Ask God to prepare your heart for love.
missions.whyThisMatters: God can guide your timing and choices.

cards.title: Pray this
bullets: “God, prepare my heart for healthy love.”

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Readiness Habit
missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Habits keep you steady.

completionCard.title: Journey complete
completionCard.message: You prepared your heart with wisdom and gentleness.

journeys.title: Opening the Heart to New Love
journeys.summary: Missions to open your heart gently, reduce fear, and take healthy steps toward love again.

milestones.title: Halfway through
milestones.message: You are becoming stronger and steadier.

missions.title: Write Your Permission Statement
missions.subtitle: Give yourself permission to love again in the future.
missions.whyThisMatters: Permission reduces guilt and fear.

cards.title: Your mission
cards.text: Write one sentence that gives you permission to love again in the future.

cards.title: Examples

“God can write a new chapter for me.”

missions.title: Name Your Fear

missions.whyThisMatters: Named fear is easier to handle.

missions.title: Talk to a Safe Person

missions.whyThisMatters: Safe support reduces shame.

cards.title: Steps

Ask them to pray with you if you want.

missions.title: Write Your Values for New Love

missions.whyThisMatters: Values protect you from confusion.

missions.title: Take One Social Step

cards.text: If you have no kid(s), use this for family boundaries instead.

cards.title: Stop this

missions.whyThisMatters: Future plans rebuild hope.

missions.title: Choose Your 7-Day Open-Heart Habit
missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.

missions.title: Write Your Dating Safety Rules
missions.subtitle: Write 5 rules that protect your heart and home.
missions.whyThisMatters: Rules make dating safer after loss.

cards.title: Your mission
cards.text: Write 5 dating safety rules you will follow.

cards.title: Examples
bullets: I date in public places early.

missions.title: Plan a Public Date
missions.subtitle: Choose a safe public date plan.
missions.whyThisMatters: Safety helps you relax and observe well.

cards.title: Steps
bullets: Tell a friend where you are going.

missions.title: Practice Your Story Boundary
missions.subtitle: Share your story without oversharing.
missions.whyThisMatters: Oversharing creates false intimacy.

cards.title: Say this

missions.whyThisMatters: A wise partner respects your history.

missions.whyThisMatters: Slow attachment helps you stay wise.

missions.whyThisMatters: Values matter more than chemistry.

cards.title: Ask this

missions.whyThisMatters: Wise counsel protects you.

missions.title: Pray for Peace
missions.subtitle: Ask God to guide your dating steps.
missions.whyThisMatters: God can guide you into peace.

missions.subtitle: Pick one habit to repeat daily.
missions.whyThisMatters: Habits keep dating healthy.

cards.title: Steps

missions.whyThisMatters: Your space supports your new chapter.

cards.title: Tip

cards.title: Say this
